locations: Willmore Wilderness Park, Improvement District No. 25, Alberta, Canada
imdb.title: Wildie
synopsis: Wildie: Canadian Rockies Series: 2 x 6Many of us have dreamed of taming one of the wild horses that still roam freely in the Rockies. Share the experience of two young native women as they each start and train a wild mare. See friendship and trust grow between horse and rider as they bond under the mentorship of Master Horseman Larry Nelles. "Wildie" shares the story of a unique horseback culture that thrives on Alberta's eastern slopes.The Alberta Film & Television Rosie Awards nominated Laura Vinson and Dave Martineau for the Best Original Musical Score (non-fiction over 30 minutes) for "Wildie" in 2013. The full documentary is 44:29 minutes.
